Despite this , Austria has the third best atmosphere behind Ireland and the Netherlands , according to the Markit Institute on Monday for its survey of 3,000 companies .
Unlike in Austria , the PMI of the euro zone rose by 1.1 points to 45.1 points , but the index is still the 13th month in a row below the 50 meter mark indicating growth .
Only Ireland 's industry broke this threshold in August with 50.9 points .
